Detailed Description

This class is a horizontal button with multiple segments.

Definition at line 51 of file CPSegmentedControl.j.

00844             remainingWidth = FLOOR(difference / _segments.length);

00107     if (_segments.length == aCount)
00108         return;
00109         
00110     var height = CGRectGetHeight([self bounds]);
00111     
00112     if (_segments.length < aCount)
00113     {        
00114         for (var index = _segments.length; index < aCount; ++index)
00115         {
00116             _segments[index] = [[_CPSegmentItem alloc] init];

00118         }
00119     }

00124     }
00125 
00126     if (_selectedSegment >= _segments.length)
00127         _selectedSegment = -1;
00128 
00129     [self tileWithChangedSegment:0];

- (void) setSelected: (BOOL)  isSelected
forSegment: (unsigned)  aSegment 
[implementation]

Sets the selection for the specified segment. If only one segment can be selected at a time, any other segment will be deselected.

Parameters:
isSelected YES selects the segment. NO deselects it.
aSegment the segment to set the selection for
Exceptions:
CPRangeException if aSegment is out of bounds

Definition at line 325 of file CPSegmentedControl.j.

00325                    :(BOOL)isSelected forSegment:(unsigned)aSegment
00326 {
00327     var segment = _segments[aSegment];
00328     
00329     // If we're already in this state, bail.
00330     if (segment.selected == isSelected)
00331         return;
00332     
00333     segment.selected = isSelected;
00334 
00335     _themeStates[aSegment] = isSelected ? CPThemeStateSelected : CPThemeStateNormal;
00336 
00337     // We need to do some cleanup if we only allow one selection.
00338     if (isSelected)
00339     {
00340         var oldSelectedSegment = _selectedSegment;
00341         
00342         _selectedSegment = aSegment;
00343         
00344         if (_trackingMode == CPSegmentSwitchTrackingSelectOne && oldSelectedSegment != aSegment && oldSelectedSegment != -1)
00345         {
00346             _segments[oldSelectedSegment].selected = NO;
00347             _themeStates[oldSelectedSegment] = CPThemeStateNormal;
00348 
00349             [self drawSegmentBezel:oldSelectedSegment highlight:NO];
00350         }
00351     }
00352     
00353     if (_trackingMode != CPSegmentSwitchTrackingMomentary)
00354         [self drawSegmentBezel:aSegment highlight:NO];
00355 
00356     [self setNeedsLayout];
00357     [self setNeedsDisplay:YES];
00358 }

- (void) setTrackingMode: (CPSegmentSwitchTracking)  aTrackingMode   [implementation]

Definition at line 185 of file CPSegmentedControl.j.

00185                        :(CPSegmentSwitchTracking)aTrackingMode
00186 {
00187     if (_trackingMode == aTrackingMode)
00188         return;
00189         
00190     _trackingMode = aTrackingMode;
00191     
00192     if (_trackingMode == CPSegmentSwitchTrackingSelectOne)
00193     {
00194         var index = 0,
00195             selected = NO;
00196         
00197         for (; index < _segments.length; ++index)
00198             if (_segments[index].selected)
00199                 if (selected)
00200                     [self setSelected:NO forSegment:index];
00201                 else
00202                     selected = YES;
00203     }
00204     
00205     else if (_trackingMode == CPSegmentSwitchTrackingMomentary)
00206     {
00207         var index = 0;
00208         
00209         for (; index < _segments.length; ++index)
00210             if (_segments[index].selected)
00211                 [self setSelected:NO forSegment:index];
00212     }
00213 }

- (void) trackSegment: (CPEvent)  anEvent   [implementation]

Handles events for the segment

Parameters:

Definition at line 727 of file CPSegmentedControl.j.

00727                     :(CPEvent)anEvent
00728 {     
00729     var type = [anEvent type],
00730         location = [self convertPoint:[anEvent locationInWindow] fromView:nil];
00731         
00732     if (type == CPLeftMouseUp)
00733     {
00734         if (_trackingSegment == -1)
00735             return;
00736 
00737         if (CGRectContainsPoint(_segments[_trackingSegment].frame, location))
00738         {
00739             if (_trackingMode == CPSegmentSwitchTrackingSelectAny)
00740             {
00741                 [self setSelected:![self isSelectedForSegment:_trackingSegment] forSegment:_trackingSegment];
00742                 
00743                 // With ANY, _selectedSegment means last pressed.
00744                 _selectedSegment = _trackingSegment;
00745             }
00746             else
00747                 [self setSelected:YES forSegment:_trackingSegment];
00748         
00749             [self sendAction:[self action] to:[self target]];
00750             
00751             if (_trackingMode == CPSegmentSwitchTrackingMomentary)
00752             {
00753                 [self setSelected:NO forSegment:_trackingSegment];
00754                 
00755                 _selectedSegment = -1;
00756             }
00757         }
00758 
00759         [self drawSegmentBezel:_trackingSegment highlight:NO];
00760         
00761         _trackingSegment = -1;
00762         
00763         return;
00764     }
00765     
00766     if (type == CPLeftMouseDown)
00767     {
00768         _trackingHighlighted = YES;
00769         _trackingSegment = [self testSegment:location];
00770         
00771         [self drawSegmentBezel:_trackingSegment highlight:YES];
00772     }
00773     
00774     else if (type == CPLeftMouseDragged)
00775     {
00776         if (_trackingSegment == -1)
00777             return;
00778 
00779         var highlighted = CGRectContainsPoint(_segments[_trackingSegment].frame, location);
00780         
00781         if (highlighted != _trackingHighlighted)
00782         {
00783             _trackingHighlighted = highlighted;
00784             
00785             [self drawSegmentBezel:_trackingSegment highlight:_trackingHighlighted];
00786         }
00787     }
00788     
00789     [CPApp setTarget:self selector:@selector(trackSegment:) forNextEventMatchingMask:CPLeftMouseDraggedMask | CPLeftMouseUpMask untilDate:nil inMode:nil dequeue:YES];
00790 }
